course_participation: Participation in the Course

Source: R/course_participation.R
course_participation.Rd

Sessions attended and participated in, for the course (anonymized)

Usage

course_participation

Format

A tibble with 734 rows and 5 variables

duration_minutes

Minutes spent in the session

guest

Whether the user is a guest or not. The course instructor and their notetaker is not a guest

date

Date of the session

session

Session number

anonymized_name

Anonymized hash of the name as an identifier
